main event: A flying disk was reported over Monroe, Michigan on 21 June 1949.
interesting points: The object was spotted traveling among several Naval aircraft,It was described as disc-like with a heavy center section,The object disappeared within two seconds of being sighted, Vapor disturbances were visible around the object as it traveled, A newspaper report corroborated the sighting from reporters who also observed it.
witness description: Mr. [redacted] and reporters from Monroe Evening News
